Title: Relates to video lottery gaming in the counties of Suffolk and Nassau; repealer
Summary: Relates to video lottery gaming in the counties of Suffolk and Nassau.
LawCode: Rpld §1617-a sub a ¶4, §1612 sub f-1, amd §1612, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to video lottery gaming in the counties of Suffolk and Nassau; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
